content.rendered:
Get Franchise

Start Your Recruitment Business. Skip the Trial and Error.

NLEY gives you the brand, blueprint, and backing for success from day one.

Get a franchise

Ongoing Business Coaching

You're never alone. Our dedicated franchise support team provides regular guidance, operational check-ins, and strategic input to help you scale smart.

Proven Business Model

Operate with the confidence of a system refined over years—complete with frameworks, tools, and best practices that drive performance.

End-to-End Training & Onboarding

Receive comprehensive training tailored to recruitment, business operations, client acquisition, and compliance—no prior HR experience needed.

Faster ROI, Lower Risk

With NLEY’s systems, brand power, and mentorship, your path to profitability is faster and more predictable than going solo.

Requirement

Top criteria to own a Franchise

Business Mindset & Leadership

Strong entrepreneurial spirit with a desire to build and lead your own recruitment business.

Financial Capability

Ability to invest the initial franchise fee and working capital as required.

Commitment to Quality & Ethics

Passionate about delivering value to clients and candidates.

Operational Involvement

Willingness to be actively involved in the day-to-day operations of the franchise.

Infrastructure Readiness

Ability to set up a small office (physical or virtual) with basic recruitment infrastructure.

Training Participation

Mandatory participation in NLEY’s onboarding and training programs.

Call Us

You can call us on

  • +91 9137 39 3383
  • +91 9137 39 3378

Apply to get a Franchise

You can directly write us at this email
